AuthorName.Content: R Widyasari, M Weyssow, IC Irsan, HW Ang, F Liauw… - arXiv preprint ;arXiv …, 2025Detecting vulnerabilities in source code remains a critical yet challenging task, especially when benign and vulnerable functions share significant similarities.
